channel.title: Projects on Kartik Kumar
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Kartik Kumar

item.title: Project 4: Computational Skepticism
item.description: Conducted research on modern and traditional model interpretability techniques. Wrote a “hands-on” book explaining why interpretability is needed and gave examples. Book helps understand how to interpret Linear Regression and Deep Learning models using below mentioned techniques. OLS Method - a traditional method used to interpret Linear Regression models. OLS Statistics AzureML - A tool made by Microsoft - can be used to achieve model interpretability with global/local feature importance and feature perturbation.

item.title: Project 3: Roommate Connector
item.description: Roommate Connector is a social media platform where people can find like minded individuals to be flatmates/roommates. The app allows users to set up a unique profile with their personal details and preferences. Users can filter from a list of other individuals to find a person based on their search. Users can make a post about their requirements and can like/comment on other posts. Users are required to pay minimal amount for this product using Stripe payments.

item.title: Project 2: Spam/Ham Classification using Deep Learning
item.description: This project uses Keras Sequential model to analyze SMS spam data and classify texts as “Spam” or “Ham”. Main part of the project was to tune every single hyperparameter in the model to study the effect n model output. Exploratory Data Analysis Baseline Model performance Leaky ReLu activation variation Link to Github repository

item.title: Project 1: thatsMyPlace
item.description: thatsMyPlace is a Java Swing application that connects users to who want to book a facility in advance to facility owners who want more customers. The application design includes two enterprises and 2-3 organizations per enterprise. App allows a customer to book a facility at an available time slot. Customers can give feedback to the facility after visit. Facility enterprise has Customer Support for managing all feedbacks and requests. Customer support coordinates with Maintenance team of the facility to reduce poor maintenance feedbacks from customer.
